@Lap1ace That's a pathetic fantasy but the thing you want to see already exists, more or less. It's called Ibitsu na Kankei. At the end, the guy gets utterly mindbroken but becomes kinda a"chad" who's with multiple girls only for the sex. All thanks to a yandere bitch who initiated everything to get him but ended up losing, and to some senpai who helped her to carry out her plan.
